item.title: Paula Abdul - Rush Rush
item.description:
작사: MORELAND PETER LORD
KY: 60573 / KY: 7584

You’re the whisper of
a summer breeze
You’re the kiss that
puts my soul at ease
What’s I’m sayin’ is
I’m into you
Here’s my story
and the story goes
You give love
you get love
And more than
heaven knows

all my heart
